description.gm:
Epitome When you epitomize The Keep, assign it to a point of interest in the farmland. A small, fortified keep springs up here. Its interior is a complex maze of locked rooms and barricaded hallwaysâ€”exploring this keep can be an exhausting ordeal, but a character who does so can be rewarded by discovering a hidden armory. A character who wishes to seek out this armory must spend 8 hours @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Force Open]{Forcing Open} doors, portcullises, and barricades with a @Check[type:athletics|dc:35] check, after which no one may search for the armory again for 1 week.

Critical Success You make it to one of the armories and discover a suit of +2 greater resilient armor. The type of armor is up to you, but it must be a common type of armor. For you, The Keep's armories are now forever empty, and you can never attempt this activity again.

Success You spend time pushing your way through the maze but don't quite reach your goal. The next time you perform this activity, you gain a +4 circumstance check to your Stealth check.

Failure You fail to reach the hidden armory.

Critical Failure You fail to reach the hidden armory and strain your muscles in an attempt to wrench open a barrier. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 3} for 1 week, or until the condition is removed via an effect like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Restoration].
description.value:
Suit Hammers (Str)

Alignment neutral good

The Keep represents steadfastness and being unshakable to threats. As long as The Keep is invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects. Whenever you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened], reduce the condition value by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If you are 20th level, the item bonus increases to +3.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Planar Palace]. The rank of the spell is one-half your level, rounded down (minimum 7th level), and the interior of the mansion appears to be the inside of a resplendent keep made of stone.
